Summary: 2 stationary lights (larger than stars) one above.
divs: Sighting DetailsIt had just turned dark (early evening) and I was walking across the lawn towardmy backdoor and glanced up at the sky (as I often do). I saw two stationaryobjects, exactly like stars except they were definitely too large to be stars. One was directly above the other separated by what would be 3-4 inches if I helda ruler up as a measure. You could tell they were like objects,three-dimensional and not that far away, very different from stars. They nevermoved, or twinkled. After staring at them for several minutes, I called myneighbor who watched them with me for 15 more minutes or so. We then returnedto our houses and didnt report it or tell anyone else.
